L. 93-198 "the Act the Council of the District of Columbia adopted Bill No. I0-702 on first and second readings, June 21, 1994 and July 5, 1994, respectively. Following the signature of the Mayor on July 25, 1994, this legislation was assigned Act No. I0-295, and published in the August 5, 1994, edition of the D.C. Register (Vol.41 page 5173) and transmitted to Congress on July 28, 1994 for a 30-day review, in accordance with Section 602(c)(I) of the Act.
